ai-kv4.4:1.1_0: When they have four factors they have
ai-kv4.4:1.3_0: Four perceptions of contact, feeling, perception, choices, and consciousness.
ai-kv4.4:1.4_0: And you don’t keep on doing it.

ai-kv4.4:4.1_0: endowed with the fruit of stream-entry,
ai-kv4.4:4.3_0: a perfected one, a fully awakened Buddha, one who goes from family to family, one in the next.
ai-kv4.4:4.4_0: And you don’t keep on doing it.
ai-kv4.4:4.5_0: He who has the fruit of once-return.
ai-kv4.4:4.8_0: And you don’t keep on doing it.
ai-kv4.4:4.9_0: He who has the fruit of non-returning,
ai-kv4.4:4.11_0: one who is extinguished between one life and the next, one who is extinguished upon landing, one who is extinguished without extra effort, one who is extinguished with extra effort, and one who heads upstream, going to the Akaniṭṭha realm.
ai-kv4.4:4.12_0: And you don’t keep on doing it.
ai-kv4.4:5.1_0: he stream-enterers, possesses the fruit of stream-entry,
ai-kv4.4:5.3_0: the a stream-enterer, a once-returner, one who goes from family to family, one-seeder,
ai-kv4.4:5.4_0: And you don’t keep on doing it.
ai-kv4.4:5.5_0: he possesses the fruit of once-return.

ai-kv4.4:6.3_0: the once-returner, a stream-enterer, one who goes from family to family, one who goes from family to family, one-seeder,
ai-kv4.4:6.4_0: And you don’t keep on doing it.
ai-kv4.4:7.3_0: endowed with the fruit of stream-entry,
ai-kv4.4:7.5_0: is a Worthy One, a Perfect Sambuddha in the world.
ai-kv4.4:7.6_0: And you don’t keep on doing it.
ai-kv4.4:8.1_0: he should be told to say “I once-returner,” “It’s possible to say,”
ai-kv4.4:8.3_0: He who has the fruit of once-return.
ai-kv4.4:8.5_0: they are a once-returner, who deserves the best seat.
ai-kv4.4:8.6_0: And you don’t keep on doing it.
ai-kv4.4:9.1_0: he should be told, “This is the fruit of non-return.”
ai-kv4.4:9.3_0: He who has the fruit of non-returning,
ai-kv4.4:9.5_0: they become a perfected one, they will become a non-returner.
ai-kv4.4:9.6_0: And you don’t keep on doing it.
ai-kv4.4:10.3_0: they have the fruit of stream-entry.
ai-kv4.4:10.5_0: he is a non-returner, he is a stream-enterer,
ai-kv4.4:10.6_0: And you don’t keep on doing it.
ai-kv4.4:11.1_0: he should be told to say “I once-returner,” “It’s possible to say,”
ai-kv4.4:11.3_0: he possesses the fruit of once-return.
ai-kv4.4:11.5_0: he is a non-returner, he is a once-returner,
ai-kv4.4:11.6_0: And you don’t keep on doing it.
ai-kv4.4:12.3_0: he is a once-returner, possessed the fruit of stream-entry,
ai-kv4.4:12.5_0: he is a once-returner, he is a stream-enterer.
ai-kv4.4:12.6_0: And you don’t keep on doing it.
ai-kv4.4:13.1_0: endowed with the fruit of stream-entry,
ai-kv4.4:13.3_0: Having no directly experienced the fruit of stream-entry,
ai-kv4.4:13.5_0: and embracefully, he surely will be told, and he said,
ai-kv4.4:13.6_0: “The perfected ones have the fruit of stream-entry.”
ai-kv4.4:14.3_0: You’re irritable, uncertainty, and unfavourable to ignoble views, and live incompetent. Their heart is not overcome and mired in greed, hate, and delusion.
ai-kv4.4:14.4_0: And you don’t keep on doing it.
ai-kv4.4:15.1_0: He who has the fruit of once-return.
ai-kv4.4:15.5_0: and he said to us, “Oh, you surely eat the non-returner,” and he said,
ai-kv4.4:16.1_0: he has the fruit of once-returning ...
ai-kv4.4:16.3_0: I have regained the attainment of the once-returner, having sensual desire and ill will.
ai-kv4.4:16.4_0: And you don’t keep on doing it.
ai-kv4.4:17.1_0: He who has the fruit of non-returning,
ai-kv4.4:17.5_0: And now you’re acting like this.
ai-kv4.4:18.1_0: he has the fruit of non-return. he has the five lower fetters.
ai-kv4.4:18.3_0: I have recently gone forth. I have recovered ill will. And I’ve committed an offense without sensual desire.
ai-kv4.4:18.4_0: And you don’t keep on doing it.
ai-kv4.4:19.1_0: he stream-enterers, possesses the fruit of stream-entry,
ai-kv4.4:19.3_0: or I am not a non-returner,
ai-kv4.4:19.5_0: And the one who lives in need not be spoken of.
ai-kv4.4:20.1_0: he has the fruit of stream-entry, he has the fruit of stream-entry.
ai-kv4.4:20.3_1: Without fear, I’m without deluded; he has gone back to the beginning.
ai-kv4.4:20.4_0: And you don’t keep on doing it.
ai-kv4.4:21.1_0: he possesses the fruit of once-return.
ai-kv4.4:21.5_0: And the one who lives in a non-returner, who has arrived at the fruit of non-return, and who said:
ai-kv4.4:22.1_0: he is a non-returner, possessed of the fruit of once-return.
ai-kv4.4:22.3_0: the once-returner, who has realised sensual desire and ill will, and is very grossness.
ai-kv4.4:22.4_0: And you don’t keep on doing it.
ai-kv4.4:23.1_0: he is a once-returner, possessed the fruit of stream-entry,
ai-kv4.4:23.3_0: he is not a once-returner, having entered the fruit of stream-entry,
ai-kv4.4:23.5_0: The one who replies once-returners had gone forth, surely,
ai-kv4.4:24.1_0: he has the fruit of once-returning ...
ai-kv4.4:24.3_1: Without fear, I’m without deluded; he has gone back to the beginning.
ai-kv4.4:24.4_0: And you don’t keep on doing it.
ai-kv4.4:25.4_0: You don’t share the four kinds of fruit, and you have not yet become inferior.
ai-kv4.4:25.6_0: he driven out through the four kinds of fruit:
ai-kv4.4:26.4_0: I don’t allow the three fruits of non-return.
ai-kv4.4:26.6_0: The non-returner received the fruits of non-return. And now you have no less than these three,
ai-kv4.4:27.4_0: According to the two streams, and there are two once-returners,
ai-kv4.4:27.6_0: The Sakyans were killed, and have gained two fruits. And they had not be told:
ai-kv4.4:28.1_0: There are four kinds of fruit:
ai-kv4.4:28.3_0: The four paths have been gained by the four noble paths; they have the four noble paths.
ai-kv4.4:28.4_0: And you don’t keep on doing it.
ai-kv4.4:29.1_0: those three non-returners have three fruits, and are non-returners. They have three fruits and results.
ai-kv4.4:29.3_0: There are three kinds of non-returners: they are non-returners and three kinds of non-returners.
ai-kv4.4:29.4_0: And you don’t keep on doing it.
ai-kv4.4:30.1_0: two once-returners have gained fruit, and are once-returners. They have two fruits and are once-returners.
ai-kv4.4:30.3_0: the two once-returners have acquired faith, ethics, and desire.
ai-kv4.4:30.4_0: And you don’t keep on doing it.
ai-kv4.4:30.5_0: The story at level is finished.
